languages.text: Правосудие Адептус Арбитес неумолимо — и неминуемо для каждого, кому хватило безрассудства преступить священные законы Империума.

traits.locale_text: Правосудие Адептус Арбитес неумолимо — и неминуемо для каждого, кому хватило безрассудства преступить священные законы Империума.

languages.text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.
languages.original_text: Правосудие Адептус Арбитес неумолимо — и неминуемо для каждого, кому хватило безрассудства преступить священные законы Империума.

traits.locale_text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.
The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.
The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites'in adaleti amansız olup kutsal İmparatorluk Yasası'nı ihlal edecek kadar gözü kara olan herkes için kaçınılmazdır.
languages.original_text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Arbites'in adaleti amansız olup kutsal İmparatorluk Yasası'nı ihlal edecek kadar gözü kara olan herkes için kaçınılmazdır.

languages.text: 高等裁定局の正義は容赦ない。神聖なる帝国法を軽率にも侵す者は、決して逃れられない。
languages.original_text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局の正義は容赦ない。神聖なる帝国法を軽率にも侵す者は、決して逃れられない。

languages.text: Der Richtspruch des Adeptus Arbites ist unerbittlich ... und unausweichlich für jeden Narren, der es wagt, gegen das heilige imperiale Gesetz zu verstoßen.
languages.original_text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

traits.locale_text: Der Richtspruch des Adeptus Arbites ist unerbittlich ... und unausweichlich für jeden Narren, der es wagt, gegen das heilige imperiale Gesetz zu verstoßen.

languages.text: La justice de l'Adeptus Arbites est implacable et inéluctable pour toute personne assez téméraire pour enfreindre la loi impériale sacrée.
languages.original_text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

traits.locale_text: La justice de l'Adeptus Arbites est implacable et inéluctable pour toute personne assez téméraire pour enfreindre la loi impériale sacrée.

languages.text: La justicia del Adeptus Arbites es implacable e inevitable para cualquier necio que quebrante la sagrada Ley Imperial.
languages.original_text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

traits.locale_text: La justicia del Adeptus Arbites es implacable e inevitable para cualquier necio que quebrante la sagrada Ley Imperial.

languages.text: 帝国法务部的正义不容动摇。任何胆敢亵渎神圣帝国律法之人，必将遭到正义之剑的制裁。
languages.original_text: The justice of the Adeptus Arbites is implacable — and inescapable for anyone foolhardy enough to violate the sacred Imperial Law.

traits.locale_text: 帝国法务部的正义不容动摇。任何胆敢亵渎神圣帝国律法之人，必将遭到正义之剑的制裁。
